content: As an AI language model, I don't have first-hand experience of the optimal time of the day to spot wildlife in Hague, Virginia. However, in general, early mornings and late afternoons or early evenings are typically the best times to see wildlife because many animals are most active during these times. Additionally, these times of the day usually make for the most pleasant paddling experiences due to less wind and less boat traffic. If your goal is to see wildlife while kayaking or canoeing, it may be best to plan your trip around these time frames.
